title: Bathroom
description: Clean the bathroom means wiping down and ensuring no dirty spots are in the bath, sink, toilet or walls. To keep bath mats and hand towels washed and check on hand soap

title: Floors
description: Keeping the floors clean is an important job in keeping insects and mouses out of the house. I means to do daily sweeps of the kitchen floor and once per week give the house a vacuum then wash. Its best to put some water in the laundry sink, some bleach and floor clearing products instead of using a bucket.

title: Bins
description: The bins go out each week, except the green waste bins, which go out each fortnight. Take care of keeping bins in the kitchen, bathroom and help educate the housemates about recycling bin requirements. Bring in the bins once the rubbish has been collected and if the bins are smelly, please give them a wash

title: De-clutter
description: The house has been a share-house for a long time and it has accumulated a lot of unwanted items. THe most important part is making sure the fridge is kept clean and that shelves in the kitchen are not overflowing with items left behind. There is also a lot of piled up items around the house, with some communication in the group chat try clear up areas to make the place nice.

title: Gardening
description: The garden is always the neglected part of the house. This job is to give around 1.5hr per month in gardening work, cutting back trees and clearing out green waste

title: Problem?
description: If there is an issue with a housemate, try be understanding of that person situation and let them know of the issue. If it starts to get nasty or the problem continues, let Mark know and he will try resolve it.
